headline: T. Rowe Price Leadership Shift And New ETF Underpin Valuation Upside
summary: T. Rowe Price Group (NasdaqGS:TROW) announced a leadership succession plan for T. Rowe Price Investment Management, with Steph Jackson scheduled to retire at the end of 2026. Steven Krichbaum has been named her successor, with a planned year-long transition period before he assumes full leadership. The firm also introduced the T. Rowe Price Innovation Leaders ETF, an actively managed fund focused on companies seen as leaders in key areas of innovation. These moves affect both the leadership...
